org.eclipse.ui.part

Class DrillDownComposite

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget
      • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control
        • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Scrollable
          • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite
            • org.eclipse.ui.part.DrillDownComposite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable

    public class DrillDownComposite
extends Composite
    Class DrillDownComposite implements a simple web style navigation metaphor. Home, back, and "drill into" buttons are added to a tree viewer for easier navigation.

    To use the DrillDownComposite..

    • Create an instance of DrillDownComposite.
    • Create a tree viewer.
    • Pass the second tree viewer into the composite by calling setChildTree.
